parameters.name: CheckDomainShow
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to display domain names that are under review, failed the review, or failed to be configured. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that is used as a keyword to filter domain names. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: DomainSearchType
parameters.description:
The search method. Default value: full_match. Valid values:

*   **fuzzy_match**: fuzzy match
*   **pre_match**: prefix match
*   **suf_match**: suffix match
*   **full_match**: exact match

parameters.name: DomainStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the domain name. Valid values:

*   **online**: enabled
*   **offline**: disabled
*   **configuring**: configuring
*   **configure_failed**: configuration failed
*   **checking**: reviewing
*   **check_failed:** review failed

parameters.name: FuncFilter
parameters.description:
The status of the feature.

*   config: The feature is enabled.
*   unconfig: The feature is not enabled.

parameters.name: FuncId
parameters.description: The ID of the feature. For example, a value of 7 specifies the feature of configuring an expiration rule for a specific directory. For more information about feature IDs, see [Parameters for configuring features for domain names](~~410622~~).

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: **1** to **100000**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of domain names per page. Default value: **20**.**** Valid values: **1** to **500**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
